main event: On January 8, 1965, two USAF Security Police Officers at Ft Knox, Kentucky observed an unidentified object described as round, silver in color, emitting a bright orange glow, which lasted for about 10-15 minutes before it accelerated rapidly and climbed out of sight.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30-40 feet in diameter,It remained stationary for most of the time before moving,No sound was heard during the sighting,Several witnesses, including Mrs. Helen Bowman, reported a similar description of the object,Nothing was found upon investigation despite continued interest.
sighted object: unidentified flying object emitting orange glow
witness description: USAF Security Police Officers, including Mrs. Helen Bowman
